text: Hossein Mehraban () is an Iranian football forward who currently plays for Iranian football club Shahr Khodro F.C. in the Persian Gulf Pro League. ==Club career== ===Padideh=== He joined Padideh in November 2014 with three-years contract.http://www.padidefc.com/news/29431/3/%D8%B3%D9%88%D9%85%DB%8C%D9%86-%D9%85%D9%84%DB%8C%E2%80%8C%D9%BE%D9%88%D8%B4-%D8%AC%D9%88%D8%A7%D9%86%D8%A7%D9%86-%D8%A8%D9%87-%D9%BE%D8%AF%DB%8C%D8%AF%D9%87-%D9%BE%DB%8C%D9%88%D8%B3%D8%AA He made his debut for Padideh in 2014–15 Iran Pro League against Esteghlal Khuzestan as substitute for Bahodir Nasimov.http://iranleague.ir/MatchDetails/6433 ==International career== ===Under–17=== Mehraban participated with the Iran national under-17 football team in the 2013 FIFA U-17 World Cup.https://www.fifa.com/worldfootball/statisticsandrecords/players/player=371666/index.html ===Under–20=== He was invited to the Iran national under-20 football team by Ali Doustimehr to participating in the 2014 AFC U-19 Championship. ==Club career statistics== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Division !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="2"|League !colspan="2"|Hazfi Cup !colspan="2"|Asia !colspan="2"|Total |- !
